Context:
Emergency Contact Numbers:
- Emergency services (police, fire, ambulance): 911
- Security: (416) 415-4000 or "0" from a George Brown College internal Cisco phone

GBC Safety App Features:
- Allows users to call emergency services and campus security at the touch of a button
- Sends live location to GBC Security when assistance is needed on campus or to a trusted friend when travelling
- Allows reporting of safety concerns or suspicious activity on campus

Emergency Procedures:
- Remove all occupants
- Enclose the area you are leaving
- Activate the Fire Alarm
- Call Campus Security

Weather and Emergency Closure Information:
- Updates will be posted on www.georgebrown.ca
- Notification given through local radio and television stations
- Information can be obtained by calling (416) 415-2000 or toll-free 1-800-265-2002.

Phone Numbers:
- George Brown College main phone line: (416) 415-2000
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559.
